author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Central Crime Branch police arrested a couple on charges of cheating people to the tune of Rs. 1.83 crore by making them invest in a finance company that they had started.

According to the police, Siva Shankaran (53) and his wife Shanthi (46), residents of Ayanavaram, started a finance company and made 12 people invest in it and promised them high returns.

When the couple did not return the money, the investors lodged a complaint with the Commissioner. The complaint was forwarded to the CCB and the couple was arrested.
title: Couple arrested for defrauding
